He is best known for playing the main role in the movie The Cardinal (1963) and starred in The Longest Day (1962) and In Harm's Way (1965). ==Other websites== * * Category:1926 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:American novelists Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Hartford, Connecticut Category:Writers from Hartford, Connecticut
